EmailTemplate.name: Learning Plan: Factoring
EmailTemplate.subject: Start Your WEX Learning Plan
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Get a head start on your Learning Journey!
As you embark on your new journey with WEX, we challenge you to take advantage of all the learning resources you have at your disposal, including this Learning Plan.
The Global Training Team has developed self-directed and self-paced Learning Plans to jump start your success in your new role.
Your Phase I Learning Plan can be found here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1MSbGdaiqFVx0TLURiBqczsu-LDH7xfCgBSltasuiM8g/copy
Within the next two weeks, complete the Learning Plan Knowledge Check (https://forms.gle/xQkPY5ZRpjs3tYVk6) to ensure your comprehension of the content. Once completed, we'll send you the next phase.
Thank You, {!User.Name} WEX University Global Training
